ComicInfo.Title: The Burnt Offering, Part 3: When the Whip Comes Down
ComicInfo.Summary: Will the new SIX PACK tear Cable's floating sanctuary to the ground if it means ruining mankind's last hope for peace? And speaking of peace – or pieces – Deadpool is tracking down components of the hi-tech puzzle that will de-power Cable – but so is everyone else in the Marvel Universe... and wait until you find out who hired Deadpool to do the job! It's positively X-citing!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:05:52. [CVDB105851]
ComicInfo.Inker: Crystal Reid, Patrick Zircher, Rob Ross
ComicInfo.Characters: Anaconda, Beast, Bishop, Cable, Constrictor, Cyclops, Deadpool, Domino, Dum Dum Dugan, Emma Frost, Iceman, Irene Merryweather, Nick Fury, Nightcrawler, Professor X, Rachel Summers, Rogue, Silver Surfer, Solo, Storm, Wolverine
ComicInfo.Locations: New York State, Providence, Washington D.C., Xavier Institute
